verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, for joy <S%H1524><s%>, as other people <S%H5971><s%>: for thou hast gone a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, thou hast loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a reward <S%H868><s%> upon every cornfloor <S%H1637><s%> <S%H1715><s%>.
The floor <S%H1637><s%> and the winepress <S%H3342><s%> shall not feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and the new wine <S%H8492><s%> shall fail <S%H3584><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in her.

They shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> land <S%H776><s%>; but Efrayim <S%H669><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> things in Ashur <S%H804><s%>.

They shall not offer <S%H5258><s%> <S%H8799><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> offerings to the YY <S%H3068><s%>, neither shall they be pleasing <S%H6149><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him: their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be unto them as the bread <S%H3899><s%> of mourners <S%H205><s%>; all that eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thereof shall be polluted <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8691><s%>: for their bread <S%H3899><s%> for their soul <S%H5315><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
What will ye do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the solemn <S%H4150><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?

For, lo, they are gone <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> because of destruction <S%H7701><s%>: Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall gather them up <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, Memphis <S%H4644><s%> shall bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them: the pleasant <S%H4261><s%> places for their silver <S%H3701><s%>, nettles <S%H7057><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them: tshofars <S%H2336><s%> shall be in their tabernacles <S%H168><s%>.

The days <S%H3117><s%> of visitation <S%H6486><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, the days <S%H3117><s%> of recompence <S%H7966><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it: the prophet <S%H5030><s%> is a fool <S%H191><s%>, the spiritual <S%H7307><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is mad <S%H7696><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and the great <S%H7227><s%> hatred <S%H4895><s%>.

The watchman <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> was with my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: but the prophet <S%H5030><s%> is a snare <S%H6341><s%> of a fowler <S%H3352><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and hatred <S%H4895><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

They have deeply <S%H6009><s%> <S%H8689><s%> corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8765><s%> themselves, as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>: therefore he will remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, he will visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their sins <S%H2403><s%>.

I found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> like grapes <S%H6025><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> as the firstripe <S%H1063><s%> in the fig tree <S%H8384><s%> at her first time <S%H7225><s%>: but they went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Baalpeor <S%H1187><s%>, and separated <S%H5144><s%> <S%H8735><s%> themselves unto that shame <S%H1322><s%>; and their abominations <S%H8251><s%> were according as they loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

As for Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, their glory <S%H3519><s%> shall fly away <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8709><s%> like a bird <S%H5775><s%>, from the birth <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and from the womb <S%H990><s%>, and from the conception <S%H2032><s%>.

Though they bring up <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their children <S%H1121><s%>, yet will I bereave <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them, that there shall not be a man <S%H120><s%> left: yea, woe <S%H188><s%> also to them when I depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from them!

Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, as I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Tyrus <S%H6865><s%>, is planted <S%H8362><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in a pleasant place <S%H5116><s%>: but Efrayim <S%H669><s%> shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8687><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%> to the murderer <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them, O YY <S%H3068><s%>: what wilt thou give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them a miscarrying <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8688><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%> and dry <S%H6784><s%> <S%H8802><s%> breasts <S%H7699><s%>.

All their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>: for there I hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them: for the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of their doings <S%H4611><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of mine house <S%H1004><s%>, I will love <S%H160><s%> them no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: all their princes <S%H8269><s%> are revolters <S%H5637><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Efrayim <S%H669><s%> is smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8717><s%>, their root <S%H8328><s%> is dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, they shall bear <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no fruit <S%H6529><s%>: yea, though they bring forth <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, yet will I slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8689><s%> even the beloved <S%H4261><s%> fruit of their womb <S%H990><s%>.

My 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will cast them away <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, because they did not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him: and they shall be wanderers <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
